original_text: So, when he heard that Lazarus was ill, he stayed two days longer in the place where he was.
korean_text: 나사로가 병들었다 함을 들으시고 그 계시던 곳에 이틀을 더 유하시고

sentences.original_text: So, when he heard that Lazarus was ill
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그가 나사로가 아픈 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: in the place where he was.
